EmailTemplate.description: The Owner of the Quote will receive an email notification if the user did not complete the Engage Scoping Form
EmailTemplate.name: Non Completion of ESForm
EmailTemplate.subject: {!QuoteLineItem.ClientName__c} - Engage Scoping Completion Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This e-mail is a reminder to advise that the Engage Scoping form must be completed for the following products: Engage Elite, Engage Elite Plus, Engage Essentials, Engage Essentials Plus and the stage = Sold or IGAP Sold.
To create the Engage Scoping, please navigate to the "Engage Scoping And Engage Standard" button located on the Action Panel within the Quote:{!Quote.QuoteHyper__c}
